tool_description: An API that lets you find search a Chinese-English dictionary for characters, definitions, and pinyin.
name: Chinese-English Dictionary API
title: Chinese-English Dictionary API

api_list.name: /definition

optional_parameters.name: simplified
optional_parameters.description: The simplified Chinese character to search for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of definitions to return.

optional_parameters.name: traditional
optional_parameters.description: The traditional Chinese character to search for.

optional_parameters.name: any
optional_parameters.description: A search term that can be either a definition, simplified Chinese character, traditional Chinese character, or pinyin.

optional_parameters.name: exact
optional_parameters.description: Flag to set whether to return exact matches only.

optional_parameters.name: pinyin
optional_parameters.description: The pinyin to search for. This can be either with diacritics or tone numbers.
